subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the wake of their Game 4 loss in triple overtime, the Nets are seeking what they have been missing at times this season: mental toughness and physical play inside. The Bulls lead the series, 3-1.
snippet: In the wake of their Game 4 loss in triple overtime, the Nets are seeking what they have been missing at times this season: mental toughness and physical play inside. The Bulls lead the series, 3-1.
